Text: Your Enron GMAT Class at ENRON Cc Welcome Your ENRON GMAT class starts this Thursday June at the ENRON building in room EB You will be taking a paper and pencil test on this first day and you will receive your materials and first assignment Your class schedule is listed below Your instructor will be Robbie Westmoreland The schedule is as listed here Test Thursday Jun pm Class Thursday Jun pm Class Thursday July pm Class Thursday July pm Class Thursday July pm Class Thursday July pm Class Thursday Aug pm Class Thursday Aug pm If you have any questions now or while the class is going on please do not hesitate to call either Amy or Richie at the Princeton Review office at Thank you and Enjoy Amy Fogarty Assistant Course Director The Princeton Review N Post Oak Road suite Houston TX phone fax

RE Looking to take Private SessionsThere are two different classes starting Nov Please give me a call at Or really anyone in the office can help you if I am on the phone to sign up But do call as soon as possible as seating is limited Thanks Amy Amy Fogarty Assistant Course Director The Princeton Review N Post Oak Road suite Houston TX phone fax Original Message From mailto Sent Friday October PM To Amy Fogarty Subject RE Looking to take Private Sessions Amy If I could take the class beginning on November th that would be great I think it would really help me get some problems Ive been having worked out Thanks again for taking the time to get back with me I greatly appreciate it Regards Ben

RE Looking to take Private Sessionsdid you do on the test you took right after your class ended Because if you are interested in refreshing and are within the guarantee you can sit through again for free and get extra help from your instructor You have the right to retake the course as long as you have taken all of your practice tests attended all classes or made up if you missed done all homework and took your actual exam within days If you did all of that and are unhappy with your score for whatever reasonyou can repeat for free I have classes starting Nov here at the office that I can get you into and you could test either in late January when they end or if you feel comfident before that then certainly midJanuary Let me know what you think Amy Amy Fogarty Assistant Course Director The Princeton Review N Post Oak Road suite Houston TX phone fax Original Message From mailto Sent Tuesday October PM To Amy Fogarty Subject RE Looking to take Private Sessions Thanks for the reply I can understand your position I am looking more for a refresher course I am planning on taking it around mid December or as late as mid January I am beginning to start studying again on my own but I wanted to get a little more help Thanks for your call Ben

RE Looking to take Private SessionsAre you loking more for focused refresher work I can certainly try and get something set up The main problem I may have is staffing I will send out an email to my GMAT instructors and find out if my really good teachers have any time outside of their jobs and teaching Evenings are best How about your weekends When are you planning on retesting I will return your call as soon as I can We are a little short staffed so I am on the phone a bit more than normal Thanks Amy Amy Fogarty Assistant Course Director The Princeton Review N Post Oak Road suite Houston TX phone fax Original Message From mailto Sent Monday October PM To Amy Fogarty Subject Re Looking to take Private Sessions Amy I called a while back to get into the Enron class which you helped me get into and I just recently left you a message to take private sessions from the Princeton Review I have realized that I need one on one sessions to help me really prepare for the GMAT If you can point me in the right direction I would greatly appreciate it I was looking to start sessions as soon as possible Again thanks for your help with this issue Ben
